# spice.generic_kernels { #planetarypy.spice.generic_kernels }

`spice.generic_kernels`

SPICE generic kernels management.

This module provides functions for downloading and loading generic SPICE kernels
that are required for basic operations and calculations.

## Functions

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [download_generic_kernels](#planetarypy.spice.generic_kernels.download_generic_kernels) | Download all kernels required for basic SPICE operations. |
| [load_generic_kernels](#planetarypy.spice.generic_kernels.load_generic_kernels) | Load all kernels in generic_kernels list. |
| [show_loaded_kernels](#planetarypy.spice.generic_kernels.show_loaded_kernels) | Show overview of all currently loaded SPICE kernels. |

### download_generic_kernels { #planetarypy.spice.generic_kernels.download_generic_kernels }

```python
spice.generic_kernels.download_generic_kernels(overwrite=False)
```

Download all kernels required for basic SPICE operations.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name      | Type   | Description                                           | Default   |
|-----------|--------|-------------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| overwrite | bool   | Whether to overwrite existing files, by default False | `False`   |

[[source]](https://github.com/michaelaye/planetarypy/blob/main/src/planetarypy/spice/generic_kernels.py#L39-L56){.source-link target="_blank"}

### load_generic_kernels { #planetarypy.spice.generic_kernels.load_generic_kernels }

```python
spice.generic_kernels.load_generic_kernels()
```

Load all kernels in generic_kernels list.

Loads pure planetary bodies meta-kernel without spacecraft data.
Downloads any missing generic kernels.

[[source]](https://github.com/michaelaye/planetarypy/blob/main/src/planetarypy/spice/generic_kernels.py#L59-L68){.source-link target="_blank"}

### show_loaded_kernels { #planetarypy.spice.generic_kernels.show_loaded_kernels }

```python
spice.generic_kernels.show_loaded_kernels()
```

Show overview of all currently loaded SPICE kernels.

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description                                            |
|--------|--------|--------------------------------------------------------|
|        | list   | List of loaded kernel paths relative to KERNEL_STORAGE |

[[source]](https://github.com/michaelaye/planetarypy/blob/main/src/planetarypy/spice/generic_kernels.py#L71-L95){.source-link target="_blank"}
